general.description: Chevron, a roadster/sports/muscle car, was manufactured in the USA. The 1969 edition was one of the earlier versions in their third generation. The Gen-3 Cevron had a removeable roof, that came in 2 colours, but had to be installed and unistalled manually. The car itself had 8 different variants, to name a few LeMans Blue, Monza Red, Riverside Gold and Daytona Yellow
